original_title: Price of Milk tea to come down by Rs.10 soon
original_body_lines: All Island Canteen Owners' Association (AICOA) today said that the price of a cup of milk tea would be reduced by Rs.10 soon after the price of milk powder comes down.
A member of AICOA told the Daily Mirror that the decision was taken due to announcement made by the Milk Powder Importers’ Association to reduce the prices from April 1.
Accordingly, the price of a 1 kg packet of imported milk powder would be reduced by Rs. 200, and the price of a 400g packet by Rs. 80.
The price of a cup of milk tea is now Rs. 100. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
